duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead private capital raise mandates and manage process and timeline
Prepare investor marketing materials and conduct investor outreach
Structure financing commitments for sub-investment grade issuers and financial sponsor portfolio companies
Develop market views across leveraged loans, high-yield, and private credit products
Liaise and coordinate with industry coverage teams for client marketing and transaction execution

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
